pFA - Tax ( encoding a fusion protein consisting of the Gal4 DNA - binding domain fused in-frame to HTLV-I Tax ) was constructed by PCR amplification of HTLV-I Tax using pCMV4 - Tax as a template and BamHI / BglII-tagged primers .
The amplified insert was digested and ligated into the BamHI / BglII sites of pFA-CMV .
